scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev" "cd extras && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start" "cd web && npm run start" "cd extras && npm run start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd web && npm run build" "cd extras && npm run build"
